section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: cosh computes the hyperbolic cosine of the argument x. cosh(x) is defined as Angles are specified in radians. coshf is identical, save that it takes and returns float.

section.title: Returns
section.p: The computed value is returned. When the correct value would create an overflow, cosh returns the value HUGE_VAL with the appropriate sign, and the global value errno is set to ERANGE. You can modify error handling for these functions using the function matherr.
